EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Sumo user when he is invited to start using Sumo
EmailTemplate.name: Invitation (SUMO User)
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Start using SUMO!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SUMO scheduler has been configured and is ready from you to start using.
ACTION REQUIRED
New SUMO users must take 2 mins to connect their calendar, confirm their availability, and add their video conf and/or phone number.
Login to Salesforce Search for SUMO User Settings Complete the steps outlined in the article below.
Getting Started
LEARN HOW TO USE SUMO
Watch tutorials and ready articles on how to use SUMO here:
https://cep.sumoscheduler.com/user-training/
